headline: Textron Buyback And New Director Highlight Capital Discipline Focus
summary: Textron (NYSE:TXT) has authorized a major share repurchase program, signaling a fresh capital return initiative for shareholders. The company has appointed Cristina Méndez, a seasoned financial executive with global experience, to its Board of Directors and Audit Committee. Textron, known for its aviation, defense, and industrial businesses, sits at the intersection of commercial aerospace demand and ongoing defense spending. For investors, a large buyback authorization and a new Board...
